snippet: Mayor Bill de Blasio’s first budget draft, released on Wednesday, puts welcome flesh on his campaign promises.
abstract: Michael Powell Gotham column; holds that New York City Mayor Bill de Blasio’s first budget draft seems to put welcome flesh on his campaign promises.
lead_paragraph: Mayor Bill de Blasio’s first budget draft, released on Wednesday, puts welcome flesh on his campaign promises.

headline.main: For de Blasio, No Magic Lost in Budget Draft
headline.print_headline: For de Blasio, No Magic Lost in Budget Draft
